alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton; Meigs (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 9:49AM CDT until June 30 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Bradley County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Meigs County in east Tennessee... Hamilton County in east Tennessee... * Until 1130 AM EDT. * At 1049 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Soddy-Daisy, or 12 miles east of Dunlap, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Cleveland, Soddy-Daisy, Lakesite, Ridgeside, South Cleveland, Harrison, Wildwood Lake, East Cleveland and Collegedale. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 1 and 26. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
